title: "Systems of Linear Equations answer"

#2a
```{r}
A <- matrix(c(4, -2, 0, 5, -2, 1, 3, 4, -1), 3, 3, TRUE)
b <- c(2, 7, 3)
showEqn(A, b)
echelon(A, b, verbose = TRUE)
```

#2b

```{r}
showEqn(A, b)
echelon(A, b, verbose = TRUE)
```
